default: 150g/5oz fresh tagliatelle, cooked according to packet instructions and drained
4 tbsp chopped fresh parsley, to serve

steps: Heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the spring onions, vegetarian bacon and chilli flakes for 2-3 minutes.
Add the cherry tomatoes and simmer for 2-3 minutes.
Add the cooked pasta to the pan and stir well to coat in the sauce.
To serve, stir the parsley into the pasta and place into a serving dish.
title: Spicy tagliatelle with parsley
